A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This move is justified in its long run time. Where The Force Awakens felt rushed and at times far too shallow\, this movie is much more thought out. Where the last movie felt like a recycled New Hope\, this is fresh and new in a way I did not expect. I was pleasantly surprised by many points of the plot and was genuinely in suspense in a way that I was not during TFA.
